website_summaries.verdict: Maintains its shape, resists the wind and moves predictably when passing, setting and spiking.
pros: Reinforced panels help maintain spherical shape
Allows for improved control while passing and hitting
Official game ball of recent Summer Olympics
cons: Heavier than other balls, but this helps with wind resistance

customer_reviews.title: My team sucks but this ball doesn’t
customer_reviews.text: I showed up for our first beach volleyball game and no one had a ball. Ordered this the following night after we got absolutely crushed. Wanted a ball that wasn’t like all the other teams. This one fit the mark. It was also a Mikasa. I played water polo with only Mikasas so it just felt right. The volleyball is a volleyball. Unique, durable, comfortable... most importantly it’s different from all the Wilson and Spalding balls popping around. We aren’t doing much better with this ball but we at least look legit when we show up for our matches.
customer_reviews.author: Cory C.

customer_reviews.title: Fun beach ball!
customer_reviews.text: I love playing with this ball! It floats well and is predictable to pass. It is a little harder to set than other beach balls in my opinion, but it also is significantly more water resistant than the other balls and, unlike some other beach balls (*cough* Spalding King of the Beach *cough*), this ball has stayed in a spherical shape. Others whom I play with, particularly those who are more focused on offense (I am mainly a defensive player) have complained that it "feels" more like an indoor ball than an outdoor ball, so there is that potential downside.
customer_reviews.author: Meesh

customer_reviews.title: Plays good. Holds up great. Just a little hard.
customer_reviews.text: This ball handles well and play great in all wind conditions. It also is easy to see in full light, shadows and flying through shadows/light. We have used it on sand and grass every day for over a month and it still looks mostly new. Our only complaint is some players say it is a little bit hard even though we have it inflated to the low end of recommended pressure.
customer_reviews.author: Nicer Than Average

customer_reviews.title: Misunderstood Volley Ball
customer_reviews.text: First time it took it to the park no one wanted to play with it, thought it was an indoor ball. I love this ball, plays like an indoor ball with the touch and feel of an outdoor ball. Has enough weight to play in a light breeze and doesn't lose shape like the Wilson AVP. Fun to play with
customer_reviews.author: My 4 boys

customer_reviews.title: Good ball
customer_reviews.text: I love Mikasa volleyballs and had a lot of beach volleyballs before. This one is a nice ball but next time I will get a more expensive one.
customer_reviews.author: Carsten

customer_reviews.title: Great ball!
customer_reviews.text: This ball is great. Where we play, there are often puddles or dew. No issue for this ball. Our group has used two of these balls all season, and they still look like new after several months of use.
customer_reviews.author: AK

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I both played volleyball in college, just so you know where we’re coming from. This is honestly a quality beach volleyball. Good feel, durable, and it floats like a beast! We’ve really enjoyed using it.
customer_reviews.author: spencer chun

customer_reviews.title: Replica!
customer_reviews.text: Was excited to see a quality ball ive played with on Amazon but lo and behold it's a replica. Its lopsided at opposite seams and the weight is also wrong. I knew something was wrong when the ball came in over inflated. Will request refund
customer_reviews.author: Rafi Mommandi

customer_reviews.title: Lopsided and bumpy
customer_reviews.text: Lopsided and there are bumps where some of the panels are seamed together. It also has very little bounce but maybe all of this changes over time as it's broken in? Not the quality I was expecting from the official FIVB beach volleyball. I also own a few official volleyballs from another organization: they are more expensive but have much better quality, shape, and feel.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan D Reed

customer_reviews.title: so far great
customer_reviews.text: just played twice with this ball, a total upgrade from the $15. The ball hits a lot faster. Great stitching, seems very durable. Only time will tell
customer_reviews.author: books_only4you

customer_reviews.title: We play lots of beach volleyball...love this ball
customer_reviews.text: We play lots of outdoor volleyball, both beach and grass. This ball is by far our favorite. Years of great play from each ball.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Good feel but a Defective ball
customer_reviews.text: The ball feels great and isn't too hard as other reviewers have mentioned. It is a tad harder than the Wilson's. The ball was way smaller than the Wilson ball I have, and sadly it is egg shaped. My review is specifically about the ball I received. I'm guessing it's a great ball otherwise for those that don't receive a defective item.
customer_reviews.author: Pablo Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Only Beach Volleyball this Coach will play with
customer_reviews.text: Great feel and tackiness for precision sets and hit placement. My last Mikasa Beach Champ lasted me 5 seasons before finally not holding air. My old Beach King lasted half that long and the outside got big scuffs that wouldn't come off. I will never go back.
customer_reviews.author: Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Great outdoor ball.
customer_reviews.text: Love this ball even though most people in my area prefer to play with the Spalding KOB. I feel like this is a better ball (and the official Olympic ball) but people are stubborn. Holds shape well, good touch.
customer_reviews.author: Jered Cuenco

customer_reviews.title: This ball stanks
customer_reviews.text: Don't know why people give this a good review. It has an awful feel. It hurts like heck to pass. Bought this and unfortunately missed the return window, so now it'll just sit. Went on Ebay to find the Wilson AVP ball that I should've bought in the first place. It's so much better. Sorry Mikasa :(
customer_reviews.author: Adam K

customer_reviews.title: Great service! I got a text & called to ...
customer_reviews.text: Great service! I got a text & called to schedule with a delivery guy, who got here as scheduled (to my home in Tel Aviv). And the ball also had air in it when it arrived! Though not 100% and in second thought - I should have ordered a pump as well ;) ). Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Nevo

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful ball, it's a light ball so it's better ...
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful ball, it's a light ball so it's better if you don't put too much air, actually as less air the ball has, you better feel and can better control the ball
customer_reviews.author: Pol

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Ball To Play With
customer_reviews.text: I play outdoor volleyball on a weekly basis and my friends and I now only use this ball. We have noticed improved play from using this ball.
customer_reviews.author: Zack Allen

customer_reviews.title: This ball is amazing! The best one to use for sand volleyball
customer_reviews.text: This ball is amazing! The best one to use for sand volleyball! It's a little bit heavier than the other official beach volleyballs from Spaulding, Wilson or Molten that make it less likely to be affected by a day with strong wind gusts!
customer_reviews.author: France

customer_reviews.title: Warped Ball
customer_reviews.text: I got this ball a few months back but haven't used it much as I've been using a league ball. Just got it out recently for a practice and found the ball was mishaped and wobbled badly in the air. Impossible to play with, but the return window is already closed I should have tried it out immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Derisive

customer_reviews.title: Lop sided uneven ball after using twice
customer_reviews.text: I thought I would try this ball out instead of buying an AVP ball. Upon receiving the ball, I inflated it to it’s proper pressure level. I played with the ball twice and it is clearly lop sided. I wonder if this is a defect, but I have never had this problem with other beach volleyballs.
customer_reviews.author: matt

customer_reviews.title: Quickly received!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, what I expected and appropriately filled air level.
customer_reviews.author: JCarew2rs

customer_reviews.title: beach volleyball
customer_reviews.text: perfect ball to play beach volleyball with. need to play a couple games to really break the ball in, but i love it
customer_reviews.author: Em0905K

customer_reviews.title: Perfect beach volleyball
customer_reviews.text: Was skeptical buying this as i know Wilson avp is good but little pricey. Turns out this is much better than the avp but not as expensive as it. Also, this ball stands out among the other ball from adjacent courts which avoid a lot of confusion.
customer_reviews.author: Venkata Rakesh Babu Ginjupalli

customer_reviews.title: Really cool ball!
customer_reviews.text: It's always when you decided to invest a little bit more that you discover that you were playing with "weird ball". Love the feeling!
customer_reviews.author: Mejnor

customer_reviews.title: The ball is good, the only thing i don't like is the ...
customer_reviews.text: The ball is good, the only thing i don't like is the weight, it's a little more heavy than the old version I have
customer_reviews.author: Yahaira Vela

customer_reviews.title: Soft and light
customer_reviews.text: I love it! It keeps the same weight in raining days.
customer_reviews.author: Yanzi

customer_reviews.title: High Quality Volleyball.
customer_reviews.text: I bought six of these volleyballs for my team. All the players really like to play with this Mikasa volleyball. They like the feel of the ball for setting and hitting. The ball is a good weight for the outdoors.
customer_reviews.author: Glen

customer_reviews.title: Good volleyball. Better quality than the Mikasa $15 versions
customer_reviews.text: Good volleyball. Better quality than the Mikasa $15 versions. Have only played a handful of games since purchase. Did need to deflate it just a tad because it came inflated to the max.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: My only issue at the moment is that the ball ...
customer_reviews.text: My only issue at the moment is that the ball feels somewhat lighter then the previous one I had which was the exact same model. But, can be just a feeling and with time landing a few times in water and dirt could improve the weight issue :- )
customer_reviews.author: tiago candeias

customer_reviews.title: Love the feel of it
customer_reviews.text: This feels so much better than the volleyballs I've had it the past. It is also twice the price, but it's worth it.
customer_reviews.author: tessarat

customer_reviews.title: Great beach volleyball
customer_reviews.text: Love the float when serving. Relatively soft. Seems pretty water repellant, though it does get a bit slick in the rain.
customer_reviews.author: Jason A. Hassett

customer_reviews.title: So different.
customer_reviews.text: This ball has speed and aerodynamic. Very light but stable when serving, high speed when Steve and spinning. I love to play with it. I recommend this for advanced players n above that's why it was the Pro Olympic ball assigned. Congratulations MIKASA, always with new technology producs. Simply the best.
customer_reviews.author: Avaaca66

customer_reviews.title: Leaky ball?
customer_reviews.text: I received the ball just as promised. I have been playing with it since I purchased it months ago. I really like it, but every week it seems like I have to pump it back up. I store it in my room away from the sunlight, and out of the cold. But I consistently have to repump the ball up. I'm not sure why but it is incredibly frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: Mitch Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Great international official beach volleyball
customer_reviews.text: Great international official beach volleyball, well done, feels great, comes half inflate so it won't ruim the ball. A little bit heavier than USA standards, but I'm sure it will last for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Lessandro Alberini

customer_reviews.title: Standard beach volleyball
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as supposed to be, check it for air since overtime it loses some.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Slick ball, seriously slick!
customer_reviews.text: Good quality ball. I run a volleyball league and purchased 3 of them. The ball has quality leather and seems to be well constructed, but has a very slippery surface. Might be better once they are broken in, but over-all, the ball is OK for this price level.
customer_reviews.author: Russell Burns

customer_reviews.title: Awesome durable outdoor volleyball
customer_reviews.text: Have used these for a couple of months in all sorts of weather. Holding up pretty strong and never had to fill in air! Excellent quality outdoor volleyball, would definitely recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: djdeep

customer_reviews.title: Good ball, but hurts arm if you are new player
customer_reviews.text: Good ball, can be hard on the arms, but we got used to it after a few days.
customer_reviews.author: Quocanle

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this Mikasa Synthetic Volleyball back in January. Over the past few days it wont hold air and partially deflates leaving it unuseable.
customer_reviews.author: Yen Ngoc Vu

customer_reviews.title: durable and professional
customer_reviews.text: big improvement over other balls i have had in the past.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a replica
customer_reviews.text: Received a replica version of the ball. Better to buy direct from the website
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Wang

customer_reviews.title: Great Ball
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this after reading most of the reviews. It has met my expectations. It feels soft when you hit the ball. Everyone who has played with it loves it too. I have not had any problems with it retaining air pressure.
customer_reviews.author: Philip J. Brill

customer_reviews.title: It is good for those wet days because it does not absorb ...
customer_reviews.text: The ball is smaller than the Wilson AVP, so it's lighter. It is good for those wet days because it does not absorb moisture much.
customer_reviews.author: Babak

customer_reviews.title: Favorite
customer_reviews.text: Favorite ball for the 2 on 2 team 13's team.
customer_reviews.author: Elena B.

customer_reviews.title: Nice Volley ball
customer_reviews.text: it is really durable, we play almost every day it is a well made volleyball
customer_reviews.author: Ravindra

customer_reviews.title: Not bad but
customer_reviews.text: It slightly deformed fairly quickly. Considering the professional nature of this ball I was shocked. It feels great though, good weight, good material. It started wobbling after a month or so of weekly use.
customer_reviews.author: etapi65

customer_reviews.title: Overall feel
customer_reviews.text: The ball is a little warped for being a professional volleyball. Not the quality I hoped for the price
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product at a good price.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect weight, very soft , and water resistant. Not so good to play when the wind is strong.
customer_reviews.author: Fernando

customer_reviews.title: Mikasa FIVB Official Beach Game Ball 2010, yellow/white/blue
customer_reviews.text: My daughter plays HS volley ball so I built a outdoor court for her to use at home during the off-season. It took a while to find a quality ball to stand up to the outdoor envirement and this one does so with a good pice.
customer_reviews.author: Roadie

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Outdoor Ball
customer_reviews.text: Still my favorite outdoor ball! I've used all of the top rated vballs but this one is great. Well balanced and great tackiness for hand setting!
customer_reviews.author: Dustin Probst

customer_reviews.title: what can i do
customer_reviews.text: I just order 4 balls but one of them arrived with Punctured (small hole) leaking air
customer_reviews.author: Dan b

customer_reviews.title: FAKE
customer_reviews.text: It is fake ...doesn't ship exactly as is on photo... will ship way cheaper version
customer_reviews.author: Vitalii Samson

customer_reviews.title: Good quality product
customer_reviews.text: The ball is official beach ball, the highest quality, delivered on time
customer_reviews.author: RS

customer_reviews.title: Excellent ball - room for improvement
customer_reviews.text: Did not need to send balls full of air, seems a waste of transport cost. could send them empty and maybe cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: A Lemos

customer_reviews.title: Replica
customer_reviews.text: It’s a fake. Not official , its the replica. Bs
customer_reviews.author: Walter Grebe

customer_reviews.title: Object inside the ball
customer_reviews.text: The ball is like a rattle due object inside of it.
customer_reviews.author: Sandro Santos Pires Araújo

customer_reviews.title: Very good accurate ball
customer_reviews.text: We have using this outdoor, rain or shine. Very good accurate ball. Wind does not affect it too much. If you are used to indoor balls, you might feel too heavy.
customer_reviews.author: NJ_girl

customer_reviews.title: Great for beach volleyball
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this ball for this summer season of beach volleyball and it has yet to disappoint me. Everyone who has played with this ball has enjoyed it as well. It has a great feel to it and I could not ask for more.
customer_reviews.author: Dom

customer_reviews.title: Best volleyball for pros and amateurs
customer_reviews.text: This is a great ball and makes volleyball such a fun game to play. I don't get hurt even when receiving strong spikes, and setting the ball is co much easier with it. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Susana Campuzano

customer_reviews.title: good ball
customer_reviews.text: No complains about the product, it is awesome. It came deflated though.
customer_reviews.author: Marco

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The two of them arrived in perfect form and on time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I had the old version and liked it. This one is even better. For this quality, the price is good.
customer_reviews.author: Brendon Petersheim

customer_reviews.title: Mikasa Beach Ball
customer_reviews.text: We tried it in the beach and it work excellent for my kids. They love their new beach ball. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Davila

customer_reviews.title: Mikasa Beach Ball
customer_reviews.text: Work great in the beach. My kids love it. They are looking forward for the beach volleyball competitions. Thanks & take care.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Davila

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME!!!
customer_reviews.text: This beach volleyball was better than I anticipated. It was just as advertised - soft and easy to control. My volleyball friends and teammates are very impressed with this ball. Everyone we play with really enjoys the feel and comfort of this Olympic style beach volleyball. If you have the means, I highly recommend picking one up. Great Ball! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: VBall25

customer_reviews.title: Superb quality and style
customer_reviews.text: Soft on touch, flies nicely, pretty on look. I've played both indoor and outdoor volleyball for about 11 years, experienced many balls and this is the on the top of them. This ball is the best you can get for a beach volleyball. The same type is used for all major professional events like FIVB Swatch World Tour.
customer_reviews.author: Josef Sustacek

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love my volleyball
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love my volleyball!! It holds up very nicely and does not soak up much water when playing in rain or mud.
customer_reviews.author: Allie Schertz

customer_reviews.title: Using for long time :)
customer_reviews.text: I used another two types of MIKASA balls for beach Volleyball till I reach this master. Now no way to go back! This one is winner! Angelina

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: i have never played with a better ball than this one, perfect for the beach, little hard for first half a day, but after that just perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Waldo

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This is a official beach game ball. I'm a professional beach volleyball player and i need it. Great price! Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Adriano Fonseca

customer_reviews.title: Best ball to play beach volley
customer_reviews.text: No cons, only pros. Best ball to play beach volley. Excellent quality. Been playing for more than 6 years and it's the best i've ever played, been playing with this for 2 years and it's the best that's around.
customer_reviews.author: Eduardo Manso Sayao

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I Love It. It arived in only 23 days 😍.

customer_reviews.title: Cheap version of a real VLS300
customer_reviews.text: I have played with the VLS300 for years and was very skeptical ordering it online. Turns out, for very good reason, this feels like a cheap, plastic heavy version of the ball... weeks after purchase it still feels and sounds like a basketball. Extremely disappointed... not how the ball is supposed to feel at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looooove!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these Mikasa Beach Volleyballs for my boyfriend and he looooves them and I do too! We play at least once a week! He was so happy to recieve this for his birthday! Volleyball is light and love the detail!

customer_reviews.title: Great ball
customer_reviews.text: It is a great ball to play volleyball on the beach. I recommend it. Bought it in the US and brought it empty to Brazil. It was still perfect.

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: The volleyball has the right touch and feel. It's well made. Love it.

customer_reviews.title: it is not bad at all
customer_reviews.text: first time I am using this, instead of Spalding and Wilson. it is not bad at all.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!!!
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived as promissed, at the date and in perfect state...

customer_reviews.title: Great ball
customer_reviews.text: Great volleyball! Softer on the touch than a lot of cheaper volleyballs. No lasting stings on hits. Good stitching, comes inflated. Couldn't be happier.

customer_reviews.title: Great volleyball
customer_reviews.text: Great volleyball, super fast shipment, would recommend for anyone wanting a great beach volleyball , if I ever need another one, I'll be coming back here

customer_reviews.title: Enjoyed playing with this ball
customer_reviews.text: Enjoyed playing with this ball, only used it a hand full of times but a lost piece of wire punctured through the ball at a public beach volley coart while playing with it. Don’t think this would have happened with the Wilson AVP or the Spalding King of the Beach. Spalding, do you back your product?
customer_reviews.author: Carl L. Templeton

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: It's awesome to own and play with the same ball that olympians use. The ball is soft and super easy to hand set. However, it's not nearly as responsive as spalding's king of the beach ball which is quickly becoming the standard beach ball. In other words, this ball just doesn't bounce much. Spalding's king of the beach is also a bit cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Gorman

customer_reviews.title: Great!! = )
customer_reviews.text: This is a great beach volleyball. Mikasa just never fail to please. Well balanced ball, perfect shape, weight, and movement through the air. Behaves exactly as a good beach volleyball should; and from past experience with this brand... expect this new ball to continue to function as it should for a long time to come :) Would recommend this ball to anyone :)

customer_reviews.title: Completely Satisfied

customer_reviews.title: The Best Outdoor Volleyball.
customer_reviews.text: No better outdoor/ beach volleyball than this, if you were planning to get the $60 Wilson ball... DON'T. Not that it's bad or worse than this but because Mikasa is just better, much better. Just cover the difference and get this ball, Mikasa isn't expensive for nothing. It's premium and it barely or doesn't hurt the arms.

customer_reviews.title: I am disappointed because this ball was smaller than standard and No ...
customer_reviews.text: I am disappointed because this ball was smaller than standard and No one wanted to play with it. I need to return it .

customer_reviews.title: Great FAST ball
customer_reviews.text: Great FAST ball, People that complain about it being too slippery are whining and should not be listened to. It has great feel. I play with it ALL of the time. one minor complain: It needs more white on it. playing at night can be difficult because it turns into a blur.

customer_reviews.title: My fave ball !
customer_reviews.text: My number one beach volleyball ! Have used it once for competitive plays at the beach. It does not absorb water on contact. Arrived quite quickly to NZ within 15 days from date of order. Bought at special price, very happy !
customer_reviews.author: ME-GIRL

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Olympic level volleyball. a bit expensive but I have not regret.

customer_reviews.title: I've played this ball for a good 3 weeks and it deflates daily so I have ...
customer_reviews.text: I would totally give it a five star rating if it wasn't for the ball recently deflating on me. I've played this ball for a good 3 weeks and it deflates daily so I have to pump it every time. Now it has gotten worst and I'm forced to inflate it game.
customer_reviews.author: Johnathan Duong

customer_reviews.title: Ball leaks air
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 balls, and having started to use both, one of them doesn/t hold the air inside anymore, even being used correctly and without having been punched or perforated. Chinese ball?

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: the ball is somewhat smaller than outdoor game ball, maybe it is for beach.
customer_reviews.author: ChrisM

customer_reviews.title: It's not a first choice ball
customer_reviews.text: This isn't the first ball picked when we play. It plays "light" and the texture of the ball also makes it slick when it gets a little bit of sweat on it. The first choice ball in most of our leagues is the Spalding King of the Beach ball, but this is used typically second if there's not a Spalding around.
customer_reviews.author: rdog28

customer_reviews.title: Not an Olympic ball.
customer_reviews.text: This was advertised as a "Rio" Olympic volleyball, it is a good ball but doesn't have any reference to Rio on the ball. That was kind of the point of buying it. I feel it was falsely advertised.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed. Feels cheap
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. Feels cheap. Gets slippery from sweat. This is maybe a $15 ball to use when it is wet out to keep your good ball dry.
customer_reviews.author: William Townsend

customer_reviews.title: The package could use some improvement
customer_reviews.text: Just received it, 3 days prior to estimated delivery. I'm just not happy it doesn't come inflated (blown-up) and I will either need to purchase a pump or find someone else that has one so I can borrow. It's expensive... why can't it come in a better package than the plastic one. The ball itself, well I can't quite comment on that yet because it's not in inflated form yet. In the meantime, it looks nice and instead of the mini circle of words towards the bottom, it says "FIVB Approved" ^TM. So if you get this, that probably means you should have a pump ready as well.
customer_reviews.author: Helen

customer_reviews.title: Great Volleyball
customer_reviews.text: Love this volleyball. It got ran over by a car and we kept playing with it for hours later (and it's still in great shape). It sets well. It's easy to play with. It's the preferred ball we use for our volleyball group.
customer_reviews.author: Blessed by Jesus

product_meta.title: MIKASA VLS300, BEACH CHAMP – OFFICIAL GAME BALL OF THE FIVB,Blue/Yellow
product_meta.description:
The official beach volleyball of the 2012 London Games, the Mikasa VLS300 features a softer composite cover for better control. The double cloth backing offers superior shape retention and water resistance.

AMAZON.COM
Mikasa has improved upon its legendary beach game volleyball to deliver improved control when passing and hitting as well as improved water resistance. The 2010 FIVB Game Ball unites the latest in technology for superb handling with a softer composite cover for better control, a double cloth backing for superior shape retention, and improved water resistance for less weight fluctuations. With a signature curved, 10-panel design and bright blue, yellow, and white color themes, you can't miss the quality of this Mikasa game ball. Backed by a 3-year warranty from Mikasa.

 Manufacturer Warranty
3 years

Official beach volleyball of the fib

Official game ball used in the 2012 London Olympics and 2016 Rio Olympics
